query.description: Number of random entities to return (max: 50)

request.description: Retrieves 20 random entities. You can set limit between 1-50.
Searches entities by display name and profile names (fullName, artistName, etc). Case-insensitive partial matching.

request.description: Analyzes a question and all its answers using Spring AI. Generates intelligent insights about what followers think, expect, and criticize. Returns a 3-line summary.
Analyzes a specific feedback/comment in context of all answers to determine alignment with majority sentiment. Useful for identifying common complaints or unique insights.
Analyzes all questions created by the logged-in user with comprehensive insights including executive summary, sentiment analysis, liked/disliked aspects, future expectations, and recommendations.

request.description: Get all entities created by the logged-in user with complete profile details. Uses authorization header to identify user and returns all entity types (BUSINESS, BUSINESS_LEADER, POLITICIAN, CELEBRITY) with full details.

request.description: Upload a restaurant menu document. The document will be automatically chunked and embeddings will be generated for semantic search. Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF
Upload operating hours and policies document
Upload service listings and pricing information
Search for business hours and return a RAG-based answer only.
Search for menu items and pricing and return a RAG-based answer only.
Search for available services and pricing and return a RAG-based answer only.
Search for reservation and cancellation policies and return a RAG-based answer only.
